Oct. 4, 2008 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Euphonium (Llwydcoed) Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125t, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 13, 2013, 10:11 a.m. July 4, 2020, 9:12 a.m.
